Frédéric Chopin

Variations sur Là ci darem la mano de Don Juan de Mozart, op. 2

1827 · Chomiński 225 · Brown 22

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

The variations are written for piano and orchestra. They are often performed, though, by solo piano, with a virtually unchanged solo part and straightforward arrangements of the short orchestral passages. The theme, Là ci darem la mano from Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart’s opera Don Giovanni, is preceded by an introduction and followed by five variations and an Alla Polacca.

Recommended editions

  • National Edition · 15 (A XIVa) · Concert Works · ed. Jan Ekier

Duration: 16'

Difficulty: 5
